start.paragraph: Use this form to refer family to come to the UK under the Afghan Citizens Resettlement Scheme.

information-saved.paragraph1: if you need to continue the form

complete-as-referrer.header: Complete this form as if you are the referrer
complete-as-referrer.paragraph: Answer all remaining questions as if you are the person referring family to come the UK.

confirm-referrer-email.paragraph: We may use this email address to contact them for more information about the referral.

your-email.header: Do you have an email address?
your-email.paragraph: We may use this email address to contact you for more information about the referral.

provide-telephone-number.header: Can you provide a telephone number?
provide-telephone-number.paragraph: We may contact you for more information about the referral

your-address.paragraph: If you have no fixed address, enter an address we can use to contact you.

parent-details.paragraph: Add your parents one at a time.

parent-summary.parent-limit-message: You can refer a maximum of 2 parents to come to the UK.
parent-summary.parent-limit-exceeded: You can not refer any more parents.

brother-or-sister-details.paragraph: Add your brothers or sisters one at a time.

brother-or-sister-summary.header: Brothers or sisters you are referring
brother-or-sister-summary.brother-or-sister-limit-message: You can only refer brothers or sisters that your parents are responsible for.
brother-or-sister-summary.brother-or-sister-limit-exceeded: You can not refer any more brothers or sisters.

partner.header: Wives, husbands, spouses and unmarried partners
partner.warning-text: You can only refer one husband, wife or unmarried partner
partner.notice-1: If you have a partner in the UK, you cannot refer another partner to join you.
partner.question-1: Are you referring a partner to come to the UK?
partner.link-text-2: refer your spouse (wife or husband) or your unmarried partner to come to the UK

partner-summary.partner-limit-message: You can only refer one partner to come to the UK.
partner-summary.partner-limit-exceeded: You can not refer any more partners.

children.paragraph-1: You can refer your own children to come to the UK, but they must have been born on or after 28 August 2003.
children.paragraph-2: The children you refer must not be living independently or have their own family.

child-details.paragraph: Enter the details of a child you are referring to come to the UK. Add multiple children one at a time.

children-summary.children-limit-message: You can refer a maximum of {{referredChildrenLimit}} children to come to the UK.
children-summary.children-limit-exceeded: You can not refer any more children.

additional-family.paragraph-1: Additional family member means anyone who is not:

over-18.item-1: your husband or wife (spouse), or unmarried partner

additional-family.paragraph-2: You must only refer additional family members to come to the UK in
additional-family.paragraph-3: You must have evidence to prove the exceptional circumstances.

additional-family-details.paragraph: Add your additional family members one at a time.

additional-family-summary.header: Additional family members in your referral
additional-family-summary.additional-family-limit-exceeded: You can not refer any more family members.

no-family-referred.header: You must refer a family member
no-family-referred.paragraph-1: You have told us you are not referring any family members.
no-family-referred.paragraph-2: If you are not referring a family member, you do not need to use this form.
no-family-referred.link-text: Return and refer a family member

family-in-uk.header: Family that live in the UK

family-in-uk-details.hint: Enter the details of a family member that lives in the UK.

family-in-uk-summary.header: Family members that live in the UK

how-send-decision.header: How do we send the decision on your referral?
how-send-decision.title: How do we send the decision on your referral - Refer family to come to the UK

email-decision.header: Do we send your decision to
email-decision.label: {{values.user-email}}
email-decision.title: Email address for your decision - Refer family to come to the UK

decision-postal-address.hint: If you have no fixed address, enter an address we can use to contact you
decision-postal-address.title: Postal address for the decision - Refer family to come to the UK

declaration.title: Declaration - Refer family to come to the UK

link-expired.paragraph: To keep your information safe, we need to check some of your details and email you a new link.
